subject: Your J.P. Morgan Payslip is Available
body:
Dear Thomas Francis,

Your payslip for September 2023 is now available online. Due to the public holiday, payment will be processed a day early this period.

To view your payslip, please log in to the Employee Portal.

--
J.P. Morgan Payroll - Australia
This is an automated notification. Please do not reply.
For inquiries, please contact HR Services.

subject: Client Request Follow-up
body:

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Club Plus
body:
Team,

Client instruction just came down. We need to immediately reduce the small-cap portfolio.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: Follow-up: Schaefer, Labadie and Greenfelder transition of funds
body:
Dear Thomas,

Hope you are well.

I'm following up on the transition of funds. We require an update by EOD Thursday for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Lisa Tran
